title: A White Horse
description: .The Memory Palace is a proud member of Radiotopia from PRX.This episode was originally released in 2016 in the days after the shooting at the Pulse nightclub in Orlando. It is re-released every year on the anniversary of the incident. Learn about your ad choices: dovetail.prx.org/ad-choices
author: Nate DiMeo

html:
The final three chapters of The Great Gatsby

Chapters 4, 5, & 6 of F. Scott Fitzgerald's The Great Gatsby.

Part one of a three part, full reading of F. Scott Fitzgerald's The Great Gatsby

(originally released in February, 2017)

Nate's annual pick, a little early this time.

For Halloween, a reading of the classic story, now newly relevant.

Re-released on the fourth anniversary of the murders of 49 people in Orlando

.Episode 160: Wong Kim Ark

Radiolab's Robert Krulwich talks with Nate DiMeo about the Memory Palace

Episode 149: Dance by the Ocean

Episode 148: Safe Passage

Exciting news here at The Memory Palace!

Re-released on the third anniversary of the Pulse Nightclub shooting.

On the 80th Anniversary of the night 20,000 Americans attended a Nazi Rally in the heart of Manhattan, a team up with our friends at Radio Diaries

Celebrate the 10th Anniversary of The Memory Palace by supporting Radiotopia

This is the very first episode of The Memory Palace. Done a gajillion years ago to test out a theory about radio storytelling. You do not have to start here. In fact, maybe you shouldn't. It's a little grim. The rest are not.  Nate
